text.div:
Organisms (Tests for Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    35691-5 XXX microorganism DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    38347-1 XXX microorganism DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    40971-4 XXX microorganism DNA [Presence] in Urine by NAA with probe detection
    40972-2 XXX microorganism DNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    41852-5 Microorganism or agent identified in Unspecified specimen
    62201-9 XXX microorganism DNA [Identifier] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    66885-5 Bacterial 16S rRNA sequencing [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen
    79390-1 Gastrointestinal pathogens identified in Stool by NAA with probe detection
    80602-6 Respiratory pathogens identified [Type] in Nasopharynx by NAA with probe detection
    81655-3 Respiratory pathogens DNA and RNA identified in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    82125-6 Respiratory pathogens DNA and RNA tested for in Pleural fluid by NAA with probe detection
    82127-2 Respiratory pathogens DNA and RNA identified in Pleural fluid by NAA with probe detection
    82134-8 Respiratory pathogens DNA and RNA tested for in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    88516-0 Gastrointestinal pathogens identified in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    92249-2 Microorganism gene tested for [Identifier] by Molecular method
    92253-4 Microorganism identified in Isolate or Specimen by Molecular genetics method
